archimate:Principle.name: Integrity Assured
archimate:Principle.documentation: The integrity of information should be protected to provide assurance that it has not suffered unauthorised modification, duplication, or deletion.

properties.value: Independent audit and review against Security Architecture Capability Maturity Model with respect to the ability to detect integrity compromise incidents.
Reporting of all incidents of compromise, including number of incidents per period, severity, and type of compromise.
